title: Whole sea bass baked on anchovy and garlic potatoes with a pickled pumpkin and walnut salad
description: A wonderful meal for four people. Whole fish is roasted on a layer of potatoes with herbs and a punchy dressing, served with a flavour-packed pickled walnut salad.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz small, young delica pumpkin (or other young pumpkin), quartered and deseeded but not peeled, very thinly sliced on a mandoline
few sprigs fresh thyme, leaves picked
extra virgin olive oil, to drizzle
1.5kg/3lb 5oz large waxy potatoes, such as Desiree or Charlotte, cut into into 8–10mm thick slices
8 anchovy fillets in olive oil, drained and sliced
1.75kg/4lb whole sea bass (or red snapper), gutted and scaled
3 lemon leaves (if you can get them)
sea salt flakes and freshly ground black pepper
